QuestData.Title: Megs in Marketing
QuestData.Description: Boss, while you were down at the mines, Megs Dreadshredder in marketing was asking for you. Something about your new ride?$B$BShe's right outside the building to the left.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Megs Dreadshredder at KTC Headquarters on Kezan.
QuestData.RewardText: There $g he : she; is! I think you're going to like this!
